mapper.insert: insert into task_group (id_, group_name, group_desc, enable_, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update task_group set group_name = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_desc = #{groupDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable_ = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id_, group_name, group_desc, enable_, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from task_group where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id_, group_name, group_desc, enable_, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from task_group
